com.google.android.exoplayer.drm

Interface MediaDrmCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmoothStreamingTestMediaDrmCallback, WidevineTestMediaDrmCallback

    public interface MediaDrmCallback
    Performs MediaDrm key and provisioning requests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] executeKeyRequest(java.util.UUID uuid, MediaDrm.KeyRequest request)
      Executes a key request.
      byte[] executeProvisionRequest(java.util.UUID uuid, MediaDrm.ProvisionRequest request)
      Executes a provisioning request.

    • Method Detail

      • executeProvisionRequest

        byte[] executeProvisionRequest(java.util.UUID uuid,
                             MediaDrm.ProvisionRequest request)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes a provisioning request.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the content protection scheme.
        request - The request.
        Returns:
        The response data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an error occurred executing the request.
